Beforehand, the only reason to join this group was to download the
files.  =
With spam getting so bad, I'm having to go back on that to say
you need to =
join the group to post and/or download the files.

> I suspect you're right=
, there's not really a need to allow non-member
 posts; I'm betting there h=
asn't been one in a very long time.
